name: WEB (W.I.P.)
description: Created for Mini Jam 123: Web in 3 days. CONTROLS: WASD or Arrows - movement To talk to someone, just go to them and select the correct direction button.  For example, if someone is standing to your right, then to talk to them you need to press the right arrow or "D". Story: You find yourself in an infinite space. There are intelligent beings in the center, and there is only emptiness around them. GAMEPLAY: Explore the world and talk to strange objects. The game has only one logical ending. Make your way to the end through the puzzles.
